reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and warm, with one mentioning it's fantastic for warmer spring weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish
items.body: Sweet and stylish! This little sweater was the perfect addition to my long plain black dress. It added a little contrast of material, little warmth but still kept cool with short sleeves. I bought in black will be getting in different colors. Read more
items.author: AR

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Great top. Looks just like the picture and is flattering with a skirt or high waisted jeans. The knit is a bit loose which is fantastic for warmer spring weather, but that causes it to be see through. I wear a thin cami under mine. Great purchase. Read more
items.author: Samantha

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Super tiny and scratchy
items.body: Not a great product - super small, itchy fabric, shape of sleeves is cute but tight and I sized up. Read more
items.author: sm ded

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Missed the mark
items.body: Super cute style, but Quality isn’t as great in person. The material doesn’t really feel soft at all. This one unfortunately missed the mark. Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering!
items.body: So flattering and I wanted to love it, but the arm holes show your bra and I didn’t like that. I felt like I’d be self conscious about keeping my arms down so I returned it. But if that doesn’t bother you or you want to wear a bandeau under it, it’s perfect. Fits TTS. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute enough just not stellar
items.body: The material is soft and the quality is fair. It came already with small snags so I will have to be really careful with it. The color is nice, light sandy color, not really apricot but pretty. Its also not really bubbly or balloony in shape like I expected but just a cropped sweater. Overall its cute enough to keep but I don’t expect it to last very many seasons due to the lower quality material/construction. Read more
items.author: PamelaN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and flattering
items.body: This top is super cute and the fit was perfect. I was worried it would be itchy, but it’s soft and comfortable. The knit is not super tight, so you can see through a bit, but otherwise love it! Read more
items.author: GWJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater to transition from fall to winter
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. It fits perfectly and can go with pretty much anything. I dress it up or down and always get compliments on it. It is so good, I am buying in more colors. Read more
items.author: Karen K.

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot Pure, Solid Apricot, Solid Grey, Solid Hot Pink, Apricot, Solid White, Apricot Solid, Solid Red, Solid Green, Coffee Brown, Red, Crop Black, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
